summary: Four Italian young adults longing to change their lives. The encounter with Mei Mei, a young Chinese prostitute, shines a light on the truth: the gain of one's freedom is, above all, an inside job.
cast: Rossella D'Andrea|Xueying Deng|Valerio Di Benedetto|Cristian Di Sante|Tsang Wei Min|Sara Tosti|Claudia Vismara
title: Spaghetti Story
